name: MotoCrosswords
description:
This is a word game based on the traditional crossword puzzle but created for those who love motorcycles. Topics covered include motor racing, history, travel and technology. All the words in the puzzles are motorcycling-themed and test a combination of specific and general knowledge. 

The entire game includes 24 puzzles starting with simple 9x9 grid crosswords going up to more challenging 15x15 grid games. There is no progression of play and users are free to play any size and complexity of puzzle they wish.
